items.title: How Discord achieves native iOS performance with React Native
items.description: Early on at Discord, we adopted React Native as soon as it was open sourced to build our iOS app from the core of our React app. Years…

items.title: Asynchronous Communication: What It Is & Why You Should Care About It
items.description: All you need to know about asynchronous communication from a company that practices it, and how to create a more async culture at your company.

items.title: The Performance Review Guide for Managers — Templates and Examples for Better Feedback
items.description: Performance reviews are key to accelerating your report's career. A former Airbnb Product Lead shares the conversation template that he's used to build high-performing teams and motivate growth all year long.
